name: Sabo
text: On Play: You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to one of your opponent's cost 5 or less characters, and up to one of your opponent's cost 3 or less characters.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to one of your opponent's cost 5 or less characters, and up to one of your opponent's cost 3 or less characters.
